issue.title: [CF 131] New type: Trinket / Item: Proc - CD
issue.body:
It will be possible to have a type something like Item Proc where we input the buff of the proc and as result we have tmw to show when the buff is active with a timer and when the buff is in cd it show the same icon (with an alpha to be decided) that shows the cd ...

Now the cd is equal 5 x proc time so it is always be calculated.

This behaviour can be done also with a meta icons but it involves the creation of 3 icons of  which 2 should be hidden  (the proc and the cd timers).
If it can be avoided we should save bar spaces and configurations.

Thanks for attention and for the great addon .


> Posted by CurseForge user gmarco | Imported from CurseForge issue #131 | Raw

comments.body:
This is why the mete icon type even exists: so that I don't have to create a new icon type for every little situation. Bar space is virtually unlimited (each group can have 20*20 or 400 icons, and you can have an unlimited number of groups.)


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
